Text: hi sir. thanks for teh torrent. BUT, you didn't specify what build it is!
this matters why. Its version 8 who cares what bulid it is.

PerfectDisc is great for defragmenting hard drives. I have a copy that i purchased for use on my 2 computers. Why???? Because i'm using RAID 0 on both boot drives and you have limited resourses on software that will get this done for you on RAID 0 [mirroring]. Symantec won't work on RAID and you sure wouldn't want to use Microsoft, the buggiest software in the world, now would you???
